#summary Guide to installing TextBE

= Installing TextBE =

  # Download and install [http://www.graphviz.org/Download..php Graphviz] (if not already installed).
  # Download and install [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/ Eclipse Gallileo SR2] Modeling Tools (includes incubating projects)
  # Install EclipseGraphViz using the Abstratt Update Site
    * Help => Install new software ... => Add
       * Name: Abstratt Update Site
       * Location: http://abstratt.com/update
    * Deselect Group Items by Category option
    * Select EclipseGraphviz
    * Restart Eclipse when prompted
  # Install TextBE using the BE Update Site
    * Help => Install new software .. => Add
       * Name: Behavior Engineering Update Site
       * Location: http://www.behaviorengineering.org/update
    * Select BE => TextBE Feature
    * Choose okay to security warning when prompted
    * Restart Eclipse when prompted
